You have until 11:59 PM (UTC) on the day before the Offer Start Date to opt-in to the Ads Incentive Program by selecting one of the Offers presented in your Creator Dashboard and agreeing to the following terms. Beginning on the Offer Start Date and continuing until 11:59 PM (UTC) on the Offer End Date (“Incentive Period”), you agree that you will stream at least the Minimum Hours Broadcast (as such statistic is displayed on your Creator Dashboard) of audiovisual content, pursuant to the terms of your Affiliate Agreement or Partner Agreement (whichever is applicable) and the Twitch Terms of Service (including the Twitch Community Guidelines), and run the Ad Minutes specified in your selected Offer in consideration for the designated Completion Payout; you must have Ads Manager enabled and you must remain opted-in to Stream Display Ads for the duration of the Incentive Period. 

If you do not meet the Minimum Hours Broadcast during the Incentive Period, the Completion Payout designated by your selected Offer will be reduced by a pro rata amount (on a percentage basis) to be determined by your actual hours broadcast (“HB”) and actual ads inserted per HB during the Incentive Period. If you exceed the Minimum Hours Broadcast during the Incentive Period, you will receive payment pursuant to the terms of your Affiliate Agreement or Partner Agreement for any HB streamed in excess of the Minimum Hours Broadcast. 

You may opt-out of the Ads Incentive Program at any time during the Incentive Period by selecting the End Offer option in your selected Offer. If you opt-out of the Ads Incentive Program during the Incentive Period, the Completion Payout designated by your selected Offer will be reduced by a pro rata amount (on a percentage basis) to be determined by your actual HB and actual ads inserted per HB during the Incentive Period up until the date on which you opted-out. Your participation in the Ads Incentive Program will automatically expire at the close of the Incentive Period. In the event of a conflict between these terms and the terms of your Affiliate Agreement or Partner Agreement with regard to compensation relating to ad density, these terms will control.

You have until 11:59 PM (UTC) on the day before the Offer Start Date to opt-in to the Ads Incentive Program by selecting one of the Offers presented in your Creator Dashboard and agreeing to the following terms. Beginning on the Offer Start Date and continuing until 11:59 PM (UTC) on the Offer End Date (“Incentive Period”), you agree that you will stream at least the Minimum Hours Broadcast (as such statistic is displayed on your Creator Dashboard) of audiovisual content, pursuant to the terms of your Affiliate Agreement or Partner Agreement (whichever is applicable) and the Twitch Terms of Service (including the Twitch Community Guidelines), and run the Ad Minutes specified in your selected Offer in consideration for the designated Completion Payout; you must have Ads Manager enabled and you must remain opted-in to Stream Display Ads for the duration of the Incentive Period. 

If you do not meet the Minimum Hours Broadcast during the Incentive Period, the Completion Payout designated by your selected Offer will be reduced by a pro rata amount (on a percentage basis) to be determined by your actual hours broadcast (“HB”) and actual ads inserted per HB during the Incentive Period. If you exceed the Minimum Hours Broadcast during the Incentive Period, you will receive payment pursuant to the terms of your Affiliate Agreement or Partner Agreement for any HB streamed in excess of the Minimum Hours Broadcast. 

You may opt-out of the Ads Incentive Program at any time during the Incentive Period by selecting the End Offer option in your selected Offer. If you opt-out of the Ads Incentive Program during the Incentive Period, the Completion Payout designated by your selected Offer will be reduced by a pro rata amount (on a percentage basis) to be determined by your actual HB and actual ads inserted per HB during the Incentive Period up until the date on which you opted-out. Your participation in the Ads Incentive Program will automatically expire at the close of the Incentive Period. In the event of a conflict between these terms and the terms of your Affiliate Agreement or Partner Agreement with regard to compensation relating to ad density, these terms will control.

Block this user: Cheering makes Twitch chat more engaging for everyone. It shows streamers who their most enthusiastic fans are, and makes it easy to thank them with overlays and shoutouts. In addition, Twitch provides participating streamers a share of the revenue Twitch receives from Bits used to Cheer for them. The standard share for Partners and Affiliates is 1 cent per Bit used to Cheer for them. In some special cases, like esports tournaments or charity events, there may be different revenue sharing arrangements.

Крім того, Twitch надає стримерам-учасникам частку доходу, який Twitch отримує від Бітсів, які використовуються для їх підтримки. Стандартна частка для Партнерів і Компаньйонів становить 1 цент за Бітс, який використовується для їх підтримки.
